title: Pao’s story
abstract: “Chuyen cua Pao” aka. “Pao’s story” depicts the life of a H’Mong girl named Pao in the northwestern mountainous area of Vietnam. Pao is raised by her stepmother, who later dies in an accident, leaving Pao to track down her birth mother and unearth an old family drama. Her journey turns out to disclose an unsealed sentimental drama of the family’s past.
credits: Directed & written by Ngo Quang Hai
Montage by Trang Nguyen & Tony Norton
Cinematography by Cordelia Beresford & Tran Hung
Music by Nguyen Thien Dao & Quoc Trung
Featuring Do Thi Hai Yen, Nguyen Nhu Quynh, Ly Thanh Kha, Do Hoa Thuy & Ngo The Quan
festivals: Annual Academy Awards, 2007. Vietnam’s official submission for “Best Foreign Language Film” Oscar
Montréal World Film Festival, 2006. Nominated for “Golden Zenith”
Cinemanila International Film Festival, 2007. Nominated for “Best Southeast Asian Film”
awards: Best Picture, Vietnam’s National Film Awards, 2006
Best Cinematography, Vietnam’s National Film Awards, 2006
Best Actress, Vietnam’s National Film Awards, 2006
Best Supporting Actress, Vietnam’s National Film Awards, 2006
Asia–Pacific Film Festival’s Special Jury Award, 2006
